aboutIntro1: Hi. I'm Laura Vongsy, nice to meet you.
aboutText1: I had been working as a nurse for a few years before I felt the urge to ask myself questions about what I really wanted to do for the rest of my life.
aboutText2: I began to make researches to find the job that would suit me the best, and this is how I got interested in Web Development. I discovered a whole new world, full of challenges and full of opportunities, and I was hooked!
aboutText3: Soon after, I subscribed to an online Web Development class with Openclassrooms, and 6 months later I graduated!
aboutText4: I rapidly acquired skills in HTML, CSS, Sass and Javascript.
aboutText5: I then worked on APIs and I learned to code with ReactJs, Node Js, Express and I learned to use MongoDb and Firebase.
contactForm: Submit the form below or shoot me an email - vongsy.laura.pro@gmail.com
homeDescription: I’m specializing in building great digital experiences. Currently, I’m focused on building responsive webapplications, especialy with React js and Node Js.
